Question
========

![](vufgb-oddsratio-003-nl-table01.jpg)

Formula for the odds ratio:

$\theta = \frac{\frac{\pi_{1}}{(1-\pi_{1})}}{\frac{\pi_{2}}{(1-\pi_{2})}}$

----------
* 1.00
* 1.75
* 1.81
* 2.00
